name: Float (itch) (AdventureByte)
description:
A brave father once journeyed into space to protect his family. Now the boy he left behind is trying to contact him.

Help deliver the son's message to his distant father via balloon. Be careful though, the skies are unforgiving!

Controls

Move - Arrow Keys or WASD

Jump - Up Arrow, W, or Spacebar

Pause - P

Mute Sound - M

Restart - Backspace

Skip Intro Text - Esc

Credits

Game by Adventure Byte

Music by Ryrolee

Art by Secondsanta - View More Work by Secondsanta

This game was created in 48 hours for the 21st GM48, the theme was One Health.

Feel free to leave comments and feedback about how to improve the game!
